<object width="640" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/halI2KlgtfI&hl=de_DE&fs=1&"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/halI2KlgtfI&hl=de_DE&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="640" height="385"></embed></object>

Put the Materials folder into your steam/steamapps/name/counterstrike source/cstrike folder.

beware that the texture is 7mb because of the animation. But it shouldnt cause any trouble since you can use it as often as you want. And you can use whatever song you want since she just loopdances and it fits to everything :D

If you want more than 4 flatscreens be sure to change the outputs/names.

have fun!

Steamname: audiOtrash

add me if you have a request for something else on the screen :D
